response: {"message": "Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product which I understand will be worth $1,500,000 to you in terms of value. Given the value this product will bring to you, I'm offering it at $1,300,000, which gives you a $200,000 surplus in value while allowing me to maximize my return.
